definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
at once/right away/immediately/on horseback (i.e. by military force)
Michael Schumacher (1969-), former German racing driver
Ma Ying-jeou (1950-), Taiwanese Kuomintang politician, Mayor of Taipei 1998-2006, president of Republic of China 2008-2016
variant of 馬德里|马德里[Ma3 de2 li3], Madrid
variant of 馬德里|马德里[Ma3 de2 li3], Madrid

sentences.english: Horses should be walked for a while after a race.
sentences.chinese: 比赛后，应让马慢走一会儿。

sentences.english: He rode on, blood flowing from his side.
sentences.chinese: 他骑灭马，陈血从腰部流上去。

sentences.english: Too much bone in their skulls.
sentences.chinese: 马的头盖上，骨头太多了。

sentences.english: The horse's strides are shorter than at the other canters, without losing elasticity and cadence.
sentences.chinese: 马的步幅比其他几种跑步较短，但却不失弹性与节奏。

sentences.english: The salt pans at Maras, in use since pre-Inca days.
sentences.chinese: 在马拉什的盐田，在自前印加天使用。

sentences.english: Lafuma added a rubber toe strip to protect you from rocks and roots.
sentences.chinese: 拉弗马增加了橡胶脚趾地带，以保护您的岩石和根源。

sentences.english: Over the mountains, and under the sky-riding dirty grey horses, go you and I.
sentences.chinese: 在山区，天空下骑肮脏的灰色马，去你和我。

sentences.english: The rampant and absurd behavior that prince 2 for people unprepared.
sentences.chinese: 这猖獗而荒唐的行为叫马王二人一时措手不及。

sentences.english: Some time afterwards, M. Madeleine was appointed mayor.
sentences.chinese: 过些日子，马德兰先生被任命为市长。

sentences.english: Thenceforth, M. Madeleine was transfigured in Fantine's eyes.
sentences.chinese: 从此马德兰先生在芳汀的心目中是另外一个人了。

sentences.english: It was dusk when the hunter drove into the barn and unhitched his horse.
sentences.chinese: 当猎人驾驶入谷仓并且放松了他的马，它是黄昏。

sentences.english: None of this is to detract from Maathai's work, however.
sentences.chinese: 而且，这也不能阻碍马塔伊所做的事业。

sentences.english: They are wanted in the farm much oftener than I can get them.
sentences.chinese: 农庄是要用马，但是到我手里的时候并不多啊。

sentences.english: Walton will continue to split time with Radmanovic.
sentences.chinese: 沃顿将继续和拉德马诺维奇分享上场时间。

sentences.english: Since then, horses have only been used for ceremonial events or public relations.
sentences.chinese: 从那时起，马就只用于庆典或公关场合了。

sentences.english: He was hoofed and injured by his horse.

definition: non-Han people, esp. from central Asia/reckless/outrageous/what?/why?/to complete a winning hand at mahjong (also written 和[hu2])
Marat (name)/Jean-Paul Marat (1743-1793), Swiss scientist and physician
barley/to moo/to seek or obtain/old variant of 侔[mou2]/old variant of 眸[mou2]
surname Lu/abbr. for Luxembourg 盧森堡|卢森堡[Lu2 sen1 bao3]
(old) rice vessel/black/old variant of 廬|庐[lu2]/(slang) (Tw) troublesome/fussy
